moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.

moves.name: Chatter
moves.description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Confide
moves.description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Peck
moves.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

moves.name: Growl
moves.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making the opposing team less wary. The foes' Attack stats are lowered.

moves.name: Mirror Move
moves.description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

moves.name: Sing
moves.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

moves.name: Fury Attack
moves.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

moves.name: Chatter
moves.description: The user attacks using a sound wave based on words it has learned. It may also confuse the target.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

moves.name: Round
moves.description: The user attacks the target with a song. Others can join in the Round and make the attack do greater damage.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the Pokémon is switched out.

moves.name: Echoed Voice
moves.description: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used every turn, it does greater damage.

moves.name: Roost
moves.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: The user attacks in an uproar for three turns. Over that time, no one can fall asleep.

moves.name: Synchronoise
moves.description: Using an odd shock wave, the user inflicts damage on any Pokémon of the same type in the area around it.

moves.name: Feather Dance
moves.description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

moves.name: Hyper Voice
moves.description: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage.
